caption.p: Average of seasonal hantavirus cases and seasonal distribution (calculated as deviation from the average) in Belgium for the years 1991â€“2011. (A) Months January to March with an average of 25 cases, (B) months April to June with an average of 36 cases, (C) months July to September with an average of 40 cases, (D) months October to December with an average of 26 cases.
